text: Prepare the pears by peeling, coring, and slicing them into thin wedges.  Heat an oiled frying pan over a high heat. Add and brown the pears. Season them with salt and pepper and transfer them to a tray. Clean and re-heat the frying pan. Dry roast the walnuts and stir/toss them continuously. Add the icing sugar and shake well. Remove the pan from the heat and stir the walnuts in the sugar to caramelize them. Get a small bowl and add the honey, olive oil, balsamic vinegar to it. Season with salt and pepper and mix everything together. Mix the rocket, walnuts, and pears in a large bowl. Crumble up the blue cheese in the bowl and season everything with salt and pepper to taste. Serve in a large bowl. Drizzle the salad with vinaigrette and enjoy. Finished.
